alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:09PM CDT until June 15 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Randolph County in east central Alabama... Chambers County in east central Alabama... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ephesus to Amity Park, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Valley, Lanett, Roanoke, Wedowee, Lafayette, Stroud, La Fayette, Wadley, Woodland, Waverly, Lakeview, Five Points, Cusseta, Malone, Post Oak Forks, Denson, River View, Amity Park, Sturkie and Abanda. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
